md:
giải nghĩa từ "coated" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Coated (verb) : phủ, tráng, sơn, quét
	+ Meaning: to cover something with a layer of something else, especially to protect it or make it look more attractive.
	+ Example: The car was coated with a layer of wax to protect it from the rain.
	+ Related words: cover, layer, protect, attractive
	+ Antonyms: bare, uncovered, exposed

* Coated (adjective) : có phủ, có tráng, được sơn, được quét
	+ Meaning: having a layer of something on the surface.
	+ Example: The coated paper was waterproof.
	+ Related words: surface, layer, waterproof
	+ Antonyms: uncoated, bare, uncovered

Note: The verb "coated" can also mean to put a layer of something on the surface of something else, while the adjective "coated" describes something that has a layer of something on its surface.

  • Coated (verb) : phủ, tráng, sơn, quét

    • Example: The car was coated with a layer of wax to protect it from the rain.
    • Related words: cover, layer, protect, attractive

  • Coated (adjective) : có phủ, có tráng, được sơn, được quét

    • Meaning: having a layer of something on the surface.
    • Example: The coated paper was waterproof.
    • Related words: surface, layer, waterproof
    • Antonyms: uncoated, bare, uncovered

Note: The verb "coated" can also mean to put a layer of something on the surface of something else, while the adjective "coated" describes something that has a layer of something on its surface.
